idea:
We are a family owned & operated wholesale bakery committed to

supplying our customer with the finest quality baked goods. Our

products are baked daily with the highest standards in the industry

with only natural & fresh ingredients. At Al FORNO, we take extra care

& pride in making quality products that will take you on a flavourful

culinary experience. Hand crafted and baked throughout the day in

best standard ovens, you will find flavoured toasts, French cheese

straws, bread & pizza sticks, lavash, almond loafs, palmiers, muffins,

cup cakes and our yummy chocolates. Every ingredient, every method,

every piece of equipment and every baker who touches out product is

chosen to produce the highest and finest quality in the market.
name: PARAMOUNT PATISSERIE

idea:
Cheap PGIN India Pvt. Ltd., is a fast growing company in the hospitality industry. We started our

journey on 14th May’ 2018 and in a years’ time we have our branches in major cities like

Mumbai, Pune, Hyderabad & Chennai. We at CPI specialize in providing PG accommodation

with food facilities at a very cost effective and trusted service module. Our motto is to help

make sharing easy, enjoyable, and safe for the guests and hostel inmates.
name: CPI HOSTELS

idea: It’s a First hand Holistic solution for  restaurants. Delivery, Recipe management, food ordering, vendor management, employee management etc..
name: Food Direct

idea:
Om Vinayak Fuel Services LLP is having an online platform to provide doorstep delivery of fuel in a safe, reliable and efficient way. Anyone can Place order online and get fuel delivered at any location in specialized refuellers according to chosen schedule. When everything in the world today right from Food, cab, clothes, cars can arrive at the doorstep with just a click on phone or laptop, then why not diesel? We are making refueling smarter!

The doorstep diesel delivery solution not only provides convenience to the consumers but also roots out the losses in fuel procurement.
name: OM VINAYAK FUEL SERVICE LLP

idea: Fourstyle International Private Limited is a celebrated name in the food industry of Mumbai. We are actively engaged in manufacturing and supplying superior quality grounded spices, vegetable powder, dehydrated garlic, dehydrated onion, fried onion and tamarind powder. The grounded spices that we offer are made using the finest quality ingredients and are widely used to cook various dishes. We offer vegetable powder that is hygienically processed under the controlled conditions. Our dehydrated garlic is widely known for providing the perfect taste and flavour to the dishes. Moreover, our expertise in offering dehydrate onion and fried onion has made us more popular in the industry. The onions offered by us are highly enriched with vitamins, calcium, iron, magnesium, etc.
name: FOURSTYLE INTERNATIONAL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Climesense is an Integrated Energy Services and Engineering Company. We offer a combination of Renewable Energy Supply, Energy Efficiency, and Waste to Energy Contracting. We are driven by a total focus on bringing down your energy cost and reducing carbon emissions significantly. We treat energy as a strategic input in your operations and take a data-driven, scientific approach to help you establish control over its demand and costs.
name: CLIMESENSE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Committed professionals helping companies streamline their business processes, standardize their operations through SOPs, develop their MIS & Costing systems, assist in digital transformation, conduct internal and retail audits.


We are a young team, understand various businesses and have developed methodologies to assist all types of companies.


To know more, you can visit us on www.kdpractice.com
name: KD PRACTICE CONSULTING PRIVATE LIMITED
